snippet: Ayman al-Zawahri was quoted as saying that Muslims should “bleed America economically” and carry out “a few disparate attacks” on American soil.
abstract: Al Qaeda leader Ayman al-Zawahri delivers speech calling on Muslims to carry out terrorist attacks on American soil; speech comes one day after 12 anniversary of Sept 11 attacks.

byline.contributor: Eric Schmitt contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Ayman al-Zawahri was quoted as saying that Muslims should “bleed America economically” and carry out “a few disparate attacks” on American soil.

headline.main: Attack U.S., Qaeda Chief Tells Muslims in a Speech
headline.print_headline: Attack U.S., Qaeda Chief Tells Muslims In a Speech
